To Prof Shyy,

I am an alumnus of HKUST who graduated few years ago. I am writing to express my anger and disappointment regarding how the university handle the memorial service for Mr Chow Tsz-lok.

It is ridiculous that a top university doesn’t even allow its Student Union to organize a memorial service for its past student. It’s terrifying to see how the University and its management treat its own student. This also shows how cold blooded you are, as the head of the University. You couldn’t protect your students when they are alive and you don’t allow your student to be mourned when they are dead. I feel ashamed to be the alumnus of such an university. And the only thing I feel fortunate about is that my diploma wasn’t signed by you.

From a Furious Alumnus of HKUST
唔知佢，不過我中文仲渣
